org.example

Class ServiceReferences

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.example.ServiceReferences

  • public class ServiceReferences
extends java.lang.Object
    Implements an object that describes for one service identified by "serviceName" which data from which services are needed. JSON obtained {"serviceName" : "valueReferences" }

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.lang.String serviceName
      The service which need data from other services
      private java.util.LinkedList<ValueReferences> valueReferences
      A list of ValueReference objects that describe which data are needed and from which services

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected ServiceReferences(java.lang.String serviceName, java.lang.String valueName, java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> reference)
      Constructor to create a ServiceReferences object with a collection of service referenced
      protected ServiceReferences(java.lang.String serviceName, java.lang.String valueName, java.lang.String reference)
      Constructor to create a ServiceReferences object with only one service referenced

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void addReference(java.lang.String valueName, java.lang.String reference)
      Add a ValueReference object into valueReferences list of this instance of ServiceReferences, add into valueReferences list a type of data to obtain from one single sensor
      protected void addReferences(java.lang.String valueName, java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> references)
      Add a list of ValueReference objects into valueReferences list of this instance of ServiceReferences, add into valueReferences list a valueName type of data to obtain from a collection of services
      protected void addValueName(java.lang.String valueName) 
      protected org.json.JSONObject getJSONObjectOfReferences() 
      protected java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.Collection<java.lang.String>> getMapOfValueReferences() 
      protected java.lang.String getServiceName() 
      protected java.util.LinkedList<ValueReferences> getValueReferences() 
      protected void setServiceName(java.lang.String serviceName) 
      protected void setValueReferences(java.util.LinkedList<ValueReferences> valueReferences) 
      protected org.json.JSONObject toJSONObject()

    • Constructor Detail

      • ServiceReferences

        protected ServiceReferences(java.lang.String serviceName,
                            java.lang.String valueName,
                            java.lang.String reference)
        Constructor to create a ServiceReferences object with only one service referenced
        Parameters:
        serviceName - The service which need data from other services
        valueName - Type of data to retrieve: like temperature
        reference - Sensor name from which get valueName data

      • ServiceReferences

        protected ServiceReferences(java.lang.String serviceName,
                            java.lang.String valueName,
                            java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> reference)
        Constructor to create a ServiceReferences object with a collection of service referenced
        Parameters:
        serviceName - The service which need data from other services
        valueName - Type of data to retrieve: like temperature
        reference - Collection of Sensors names from which get valueName data

    • Method Detail

      • addReference

        protected void addReference(java.lang.String valueName,
                            java.lang.String reference)
        Add a ValueReference object into valueReferences list of this instance of ServiceReferences, add into valueReferences list a type of data to obtain from one single sensor
        Parameters:
        valueName - Type of data to retrieve: like temperature
        reference - Sensor name from which get valueName data

      • addReferences

        protected void addReferences(java.lang.String valueName,
                             java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> references)
        Add a list of ValueReference objects into valueReferences list of this instance of ServiceReferences, add into valueReferences list a valueName type of data to obtain from a collection of services
        Parameters:
        valueName - Type of data to retrieve: like temperature
        references - Collection of sensors names from which get valueName data

        protected void addValueName(java.lang.String valueName)

        protected java.lang.String getServiceName()
        Returns:
        The service which need data from other services, the service which wants this references

      • setServiceName

        protected void setServiceName(java.lang.String serviceName)

        serviceName - The service which need data from other services, the service which wants this references

      • getValueReferences

        protected java.util.LinkedList<ValueReferences> getValueReferences()
        Returns:
        valueReferences list of all the references from this service

      • setValueReferences

        protected void setValueReferences(java.util.LinkedList<ValueReferences> valueReferences)
        Parameters:
        valueReferences - new list to set in this ServiceReferences instance

      • getMapOfValueReferences

        protected java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.Collection<java.lang.String>> getMapOfValueReferences()
        Returns:
        Map of all the references required by the serviceName

      • getJSONObjectOfReferences

        protected org.json.JSONObject getJSONObjectOfReferences()
        Returns:
        JSONobject with the map of all the references required by the serviceName

      • toJSONObject

        protected org.json.JSONObject toJSONObject()
        Returns:
        JSONobject with the map of all the references required by the serviceName encapsulated in a serviceName's references set
